Dear Bill*
Just a note to say what a magnificent job I think you did in the note to
the NAEBers which we sent in the attached form, which I assume that you
have seen.
I wanted you to know that such help is greatly appreciated. It is the
sort of thing that will not let us become stagnant.
Sincerely,
Harry J. Skoraia
